description: Call a loading droid to take the heavy load for you in battle. This droid can take heavy damage and and will engage the enemy up close.
Call in a small security droid that packs a mean blaster attachment but can be killed rather easily.

text:
Begin NisavMeanieScript

short DoOnce

If (DoOnce != 1)
	disable
	set doonce to 1
endif

if (GetJournalIndex "SW_BountyQuest" == 55)
	enable
endif

	if (OnDeath == 1)
		if (GetJournalIndex "SW_BountyQuest" == 55)
			TatooineCzerkaBountyBoi->Disable
			Journal SW_BountyQuest 65
		endif
	endif
end

Begin SW_EnterSpace

short OnPCEquip
Short DoTwice
Short Flying
Short ResetCheck

If ( OnPCEquip == 1 )
	Set Flying to 1
	Set ResetCheck to 0
	Set SPHealthCheck to ( Player->GetHealth )
	If ( TravelState == 0 )
		PlaySound3d "ShipTravelSound"
		PCForce1stPerson
		Disableplayerfighting
		DisablePlayerViewSwitch
		DisableVanityMode
          Player->PositionCell, 7851, 4435, 17506, 115, "The Outer Rim"
          Player->AddSpell, "SW_ShipBuff1"
		set TravelState to 1
		MessageBox "Activate the Freighter Spell in your Spell Menu and press ^ActionReadyMagic to enable the cockpit." "OK"
	Endif
	If ( Flying == 0 )
		If (  GetPCCell, "The Outer Rim" == 1 )
			MessageBox "Activate the Freighter Spell in your Spell Menu and press ^ActionReadyMagic to enable the cockpit." "OK"
			Set Flying to 1
		Endif
	Endif
Elseif ( OnPCEquip == 0 )
	Set Flying to 0
	If ( GetPCCell, "The Outer Rim" == 1 )
		If ( ResetCheck == 0 )
			player->additem "SW_SpCarNone", 1
			player->equip, "SW_SpCarNone"
			player->removeitem "SW_SpCarNone", 1
			Enableplayerfighting
			EnablePlayerViewSwitch
			EnableVanityMode
			Player->PositionCell, 3958, 5166, 15301, 327 "The Outer Rim, Freighter"
			Player->RemoveSpell, "SW_ShipBuff1"
			Set TravelState to 0
			Set ResetCheck to 1
			MessageBox "You cannot take off your ship while in space." "OK"
		Endif
	Endif
Endif

End

Begin SW_FTravelDantooine

If ( OnActivate == 1 )
	If ( FreightTravel != 10 )
		Set FreightTravel to 10
		PlaySound3d "ShipTravelSound"
			SW_FreighterToDantooine->Enable
			SW_FreighterToTatooine->Disable
			SW_FreighterToManaan->Disable
			SW_FreighterToKashyyk->Disable
			SW_FreighterToDathomir->Disable
			SW_FreighterToGamorr->Disable
			SW_FreighterToHoth->Disable
			SW_FreighterToTaris->Disable
			SW_FreighterToM4->Disable
			SW_FreighterToNarShad->Disable
			SW_FreighterToNone->Disable
			SW_FreighterToDerelict->Disable
			SW_FreighterToLok->Disable
			Set SW_LTSPEED to 1
			SW_FreightPlanDath->Disable
			SW_FreightPlanKash->Disable
			SW_FreightPlanHoth->Disable
			SW_FreightPlanGamor->Disable
			SW_FreighterPlanTat->Disable
			SW_FreightPlanDant->Enable
			SW_FreightPlanNar->Disable
			SW_FreightPlanMana->Disable
			SW_FreightPlanM478->Disable
			SW_FreightPlanTaris->Disable
			SW_FreightDerelict1->Disable
	else
		MessageBox "You are already landed on Dantooine!"
	endif
Endif

End

Begin SW_FTravelTaris

Short MagicVar

If ( MagicVar == 0 )
	Disable
	Set MagicVar to 1
Endif

If ( OnActivate == 1 )
	If ( FreightTravel != 40 )
